response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, we believe it is worth $1,200,000 to you. Our offer to you is to purchase this exceptional item for $1,100,000. This price reflects our desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. We understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with your financial goals and expectations.
